CustomField.description: Populated when the source Subscription is cancelled or not renewed. CPQ terminated date indicates that a product has been fully decommissioned. The terminated date will always be the day before the renewal subscription's Start Date (by CPQ design).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Populated when the source Subscription is cancelled or not renewed. CPQ terminated date indicates that a product has been fully decommissioned. The terminated date will always be the day before the renewal subscription's Start Date (by CPQ design).
CustomField.label: Terminated Date
